verses.name: Ezekiel 48:30
verses.text: And these are the goings out of the city on the north side, four thousand and five hundred measures.

verses.name: Ezekiel 48:31
verses.text: And the gates of the city shall be after the names of the tribes of Israel: three gates northward; one gate of Reuben, one gate of Judah, one gate of Levi.

verses.name: Ezekiel 48:32
verses.text: And at the east side four thousand and five hundred: and three gates; and one gate of Joseph, one gate of Benjamin, one gate of Dan.
